home.title: I'm FullStack Developer
home.body: Hello! I am Nadia Antonella Ruiz, I live in Argentina. I worked on projects using technologies such as React, Express.js, MongoDB and more. My approach is to create solutions that are functional and aesthetically appealing.

about.title: About me
about.body: I am passionate about technology and how it can have a positive impact on people's lives. For me, innovation is a way to transform society, emotions, and the mind. That's why I love connecting technical skills with soft skills, because I believe that the balance between the two makes the difference.
about.body2: Music and vegetarian cooking are my favorite escapes. I love trap, pop, and national rock, and I'm always discovering new recipes that are delicious, nutritious, and full of protein that accompany my training. I also like to read personal development books, always looking to learn something new and continue growing.

experience.title: Experience
experience.body: These are the technologies I have worked with.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: If you are interested in working with me. Write me!
